abstract: Greenhill & Company hired two energy investment bankers away from Bank of America Merrill Lynch and said it would open an office, its tenth, in Houston to expand its energy practice.
snippet: Greenhill & Company hired two energy investment bankers away from Bank of America Merrill Lynch and said it would open an office, its tenth, in Houston to expand its energy practice.
lead_paragraph: Greenhill & Company keeps expanding — this time, in the Lone Star State. The New York-based boutique investment bank said Wednesday it hired two top energy investment bankers away from Bank of America Merrill Lynch and would be opening up an office, its 10th, in Houston to expand its energy practice.

headline.main: Greenhill Sets Its Sights on Energy Deals
